title: PM expresses grief over passing of Mian Amer Mahmoodâ€™s sister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday expressed deep grief over the passing of sister of Chairman Punjab Group/Dunya News Mian Amer Mahmood.
In a statement issued by the PM Office, the prime minister offered his heartfelt condolences to Mian Amer Mahmood and other family members of the deceased.
He prayed, may Allah Almighty grant the departed soul eternal peace and elevate her ranks in Jannah. He also prayed for the grant of courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with equanimity.
